ref.full: Vavina, A. V.; Seitkalieva, M. M.; Posvyatenko, A. V.; Gordeev, E. G.; Strukova, E. N.; Egorova, K. S.; Ananikov, V. P. (2022) J. Mol. Liq. 352, 118673.
ref.title: Merging structural frameworks of imidazolium, pyridinium, and cholinium ionic liquids with cinnamic acid to tune solution state behavior and properties
